      • initBlog

        protected void initBlog()
        Does nothing by default, only ensures blogOpt is never null..
        By default, blog must be set by calling setBlog(String).

        Allows overriding with custom blog for display context, for example for post in attached space (see BlogPostDisplayHandler.initBlog()).

        Since:
        blog-9.4 BLOG-296
        See Also:
        getAvailableBlog(), resetBlog(), setBlog(String)

      • setBlog

        Parameters:
        v - blog to use for display / query context.
        Since:
        blog-9.1

      • resetBlog

        protected void resetBlog()
        Resets blogOpt to null..
        initBlog() must be called after this to ensure it will be init again.
        Since:
        blog-9.4 BLOG-296
        See Also:
        initBlog()
